name: Azakas Lair
description:
Azakas Lair

Azakas Lair. is a short, first-person horror game. 

Explore and survive as you search Azakas Lair. Run, hide and out smart the beasts that lurk in the shadows of the lair as you frantically search for the exit. Experience the thrill of being chased to your doom in the dark halls of Azakas Lair.

Enter the lair at your own peril

Key features:
  • A nerve wracking, survival experience
  • A 15-30 minute experience that can be completed in one sitting
  • An experience that focuses on stealth and timing rather than action or puzzles
  • Haunting atmospheric music
  • An eerie environment that rewards players who like to hide in the dark
